name: ImageStats
author: FMRIB Analysis Group, University of Oxford
description: Use FSL fslstats command to calculate stats from images

inputs.name: In file
inputs.description: Input file to generate stats of.

inputs.name: Index mask file
inputs.description: Generate separate n submasks from indexmask, for indexvalues 1..n where n is the maximum index value in indexmask, and generate statistics for each submask.

inputs.name: Op string
inputs.description: String defining the operation, options are applied in order, e.g. -m -l 10 -m will report the non-zero mean, apply a threshold and then report the new nonzero mean.

inputs.name: Output type
inputs.description: 'nifti' or 'nifti_pair' or 'nifti_gz' or 'nifti_pair_gz'. Fsl output type.

inputs.name: Split 4d
inputs.description: Give a separate output line for each 3d volume of a 4d timeseries.
